What would you like to do today?
Are you sure you want to log out?

Aspiring mobile developer exploring technologies and learning through hands-on projects. Passionate about deep-diving into topics that spark my curiosity and constantly challenging myself to grow. A bit shy at first, but easygoing once you get to know me!

A passionate creative with a love for both art and technology. My background in painting sharpens my eye for design, and I aspire to become a UI/UX designer or Data Analyst—blending aesthetics with functionality to craft impactful digital experiences. 

Beyond the screen, I have a deep passion for travel, embracing spontaneity and drawing inspiration from new places and cultures. I thrive on impulsive adventures and creative problem-solving, always eager to explore fresh ideas and innovative solutions. 

Let’s connect and create something amazing!

Huckster is a business inventory management application designed specifically for small retail businesses, such as sari-sari stores and convenience stores.


This platform enables business owners to efficiently manage, track, and optimize their product inventories.


By providing an accessible interface and tools, Huckster empowers retailers to streamline operations, improve inventory accuracy, and make data-driven decisions to enhance business performance.
